Hi mikemelo1369 Thanks for this! Id REALLLLY love any and ALL criterion DVD-5's you might have in your collection .. they r an absolute MUST have for any movie buff! Thanks again!
@Alienel8 - I already put Braveheart up. I don't take anything away from the movie with regards to subtitles or languages. The copy I have only came with English sorry.
famemon78 - Hey np. I will upload my Criterion Collections in DVD5 format. I have Traffic, Robocop and a couple others. I'm working on my collection.
Upload Schedule: Alice In Wonderland, Astro Boy, Two Weeks Notice, Jurassic Park 1-3

i heard this movie was really good.  im downloading now.  you are awesome man.  i really like the "older" styled theme you have going on.  you are uploading some oldies that i've always wanted to see.

thank you.
